data.title: Download centre for visual elements
data.text:
All beneficiaries, managing authorities and implementing partners of EU funding must use the EU emblem in their communication to acknowledge the support received under EU programmes. It must be displayed prominently and correctly, in combination with a simple funding statement that mentions the EU’s support.

On this page beneficiaries of EU funding can download ready-to-use EU funding statements to comply with the visibility requirements.

The EU emblem and funding statement can be downloaded in all EU languages, and in 14 non-EU languages. Information about the correct use and placement of the EU emblem and the funding statement can be found in the Operational guidelines for recipients of EU funding document.

DG REGIO has also created an online generator for beneficiaries of Cohesion Policy and the Recovery and Resilience Facility to create billboards, plaques and posters in a few easy steps (as required in article 50 of the Common Provisions Regulation). Beneficiaries of other funds may also use the online generator as far as it corresponds to their legal framework.

Programming period 2021-2027

Funded by the European Union (horizontal and vertical)

Co-funded by the European Union (horizontal and vertical)
